channel.title: AKA SND - Nightcrawler [WIP, Slow-Electro]
channel.description:
SoundCloud: [AKA SND - Nightcrawler](https://soundcloud.com/akasnd/nightcrawler)
Yet another sketch-in-progress. (My start:finish ratio is not good.)
Started off as a heavy, uptempo, 4/4 rich chord-led EDM, then took a bit of a detour to a simpler, moody, slow-electro*, dark downtempo* thing.
\* Yes, I had to check if those were actually a thing. They seem to fit, sorta, kinda. ;)
